pageContent: Introduction: Prostate cancer (PCa) is the most commonly diagnosed malignancy in men and the second leading cause of cancer-related death in industrialized countries. Even if the healing chances are very high after definitive treatment of localized disease, 20-30% of patients experience recurrence.

metaData.source:
Quality of life and economic considerations in the management of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12751912/
